projects.title: Find a Developer
projects.description: This project connects developers with employers. Employers can search for developers that match their needs. Each member of the site can submit his or her profile and define his or her rate. When an employer finds the rare pearl, he can hire him for his mission based on the rates defined by the developer.

media.alt: Picture of my Find a Dev project

projects.title: Wadflix
projects.description: A movie theme web application programmed in PHP, JavaScript and MySQL. It includes the following concepts: MasterPage, AJAX, Session, Database requests: CRUD.

projects.title: Suits You
projects.description: An IT career orientation test programmed during an 3 days hackthon by a group of 4 developers.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: The website your are navigating right now allows me to display my different projets, professional background and web developer skills. This website is entirely programmed with the web trio HTML/CSS/JavaScript. It includes the following vanilla JS features: bilingual and theme toggles, a timeline, a filter project menu and the integration of Highchart library.

projects.title: JS Form
projects.description: A Javascript test of DOM manipulation: creation of a child part and visualization of a nuclear family.

projects.title: MVC ASP.Net Shows project
projects.description: A project in C# ASP.Net MVC about theater shows covering the following notions: CRUD, DAL, BLL, Common, Repositories/Services, MVC, Razor and ADO.

projects.title: Angular Introduction
projects.description: A demonstration and exercices portfolio programmed with the Angular framework.

projects.title: Pixel Art in JS
projects.description: A simple pixel art prgrammed in JavaScript to learn how to manipulate the DOM and colors.

projects.title: CV Website
projects.description: CV Project from the CSS Essential Training from Linkedin Learning
